gantrytips.tip: Use the layout slider to select the desired column distribution (width) used for the Top Position. The active value will be highlighted in black and underlined. The Force Positions attribute causes all the Top positions to be displayed. If there is no widget published in a position, then a blank space is left. The position count controls the number of forced positions.

Use the layout slider to select the desired column distribution (width) used for the Header Position. The active value will be highlighted in black and underlined. The Force Positions attribute causes all the Header positions to be displayed. If there is no widget published in a position, then a blank space is left. The position count controls the number of forced positions.

The Force Positions attribute causes all the Showcase positions to be displayed. If there is no widget published in a position, then a blank space is left. The position count controls the number of forced positions.
